widget.label: MentionMe Landing Page
widget.description: When promoting your refer-a-friend programme, you are likely to want to lead your customers to landing pages on your site which include various pieces of Mention Me functionality. If you send out emails with a referral call to action you can direct your customers to a landing page on your own site. Create that page and embed on it a referrer offer tag.

parameter.name: situation
parameter.label: Situation
parameter.description: String indicator of where you are including this tag within your site (for example: checkout, postpurchase, landingpage). Used for reporting. Can contain only letters, numbers, spaces, underscores and dashes.
